sentences.en: Annex A a normative part of this Technical Specification.

sentences.en: Appropriate relaxation of regulatory constraints, introduction of normative rules.

sentences.en: Both conformance profiles and templates express constraints against normative specifications.
sentences.cn: 适应外形和模板表达约面对正规的规范.

sentences.en: It was a normative discipline, far removed from actual observation, and its scope was limited.
sentences.cn: 那是一门规范性的学科 、 距离实际观察还很远, 它的观点必是很狭隘的.

sentences.en: Its features are normative, qualificative, operable, inheritable and changeable.

sentences.en: Neurophysiologic studies were interpreted based on age - adjusted normative data from our laboratory.

sentences.en: So it is phenomenal, instrumental and normative by nature.

sentences.en: So, the legislator shall make a definite and normative provision.
sentences.cn: 因此, 立法者必须明确、规范地制作法之适用范围条文.
